page.title: 10Beelsby
page.content: Beelsby is a small, residential village. The area around the village is devoted to farming. The oldest house in the village is Beelsby House and it is 350 years old. There are no shops nowadays but there was a shop until about 16 years ago. Two planes crashed near the village. Two farms are situated in this area. Both are owned and run by members of the same family. One of them is called Beelsby Farming Company and it grows arable crops and the other named Fenwick Brothers grows the same crops but with fruit as an extra crop. The fruits grown are strawberries, raspberries, gooseberries, blackcurrants, tayberries and they are sold as pick your own fruit.
